thread.title: Former supreme court justice Louise Arbour sounds alarm over financial tracking law
thread.title_full: Former supreme court justice Louise Arbour sounds alarm over financial tracking law - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Former supreme court justice Louise Arbour sounds alarm over financial tracking law
text: A retired supreme court justice whose daughter is running in the 2015 federal election is sounding the alarm about little-known legislation designed to track the financial transactions of so-called "politically-exposed domestic persons." ...
